description: Equip: Reduce the effectiveness of crowd controlling effects by 10%. Successfully applying a loss of control effect to an enemy, interrupting an enemy, or dispelling any target will increase all your secondary stats by 80 for 15 sec. This effect cannot occur more than once every 30 seconds.
Equip: Power Word: Radiance has a 60% chance to cause your next Penance to be free and fire 3 extra bolts.
Equip: While Stealth is active and for 4 sec after breaking Stealth, your Critical Strike chance is increased by 100%.
Equip: Casting a Frost, Fire and Arcane spell within 10 sec of each other increases your Critical Strike damage of all your spells by 20%. This effect can only occur once every 30 sec.
Equip: Your Mortal Strike has a 25% chance to apply the Colossus Smash effect to your target for 6 sec.

Equip: Casting Unholy Nova summons a Rattling Mage that gains 2% additional damage and healing each time an enemy affected by Unholy Transfusion is damaged by an ally, up to 100%.

The Rattling Mage serves you for 20 sec, blasting your target for 609 Shadow damage.

Equip: Circle of Healing reduces the cooldown of Holy Word: Sanctify, Prayer of Mending reduces the cooldown of Holy Word: Serenity, and Holy Fire reduces the cooldown of Holy Word: Chastise by 4 sec.
Equip: Frostwyrm's Fury has 50% reduced cooldown and Freezes all enemies hit for 3 sec.
Equip: Power Word: Radiance has a 60% chance to cause your next Penance to be free and fire 3 extra bolts.
Equip: Vanquisher's Hammer gains 1 additional charge. An additional cast of Templar's Verdict will automatically trigger Divine Storm.
Equip: Echoing Reprimand now animacharges 4 combo points.
Equip: Casting a Frost, Fire and Arcane spell within 10 sec of each other increases your Critical Strike damage of all your spells by 20%. This effect can only occur once every 30 sec.
Equip: Starsurge and Starfall reduce the cost of Starsurge and Starfall by 10% and increase their damage by 10% for 5 sec, stacking up to 2 times.
Equip: Swiftmend no longer consumes a heal over time effect, and extends the duration of your heal over time effects on the target by 10 sec.
Equip: Demon's Bite leaves an open wound on your enemy dealing 2,901 Chaos damage over 15 sec and increasing damage taken from your Immolation Aura by 65%.
